title: The Peter Schiff Show - 2011 Jul 26 TU [sebaygo1]
description:
.
							
The Peter Schiff Show
Tuesday, 26 July 2011


[sebaygo1]


Today's guest is Daniel Collins, president/CEO of Anda Industries (a Chinese industrial firm), on why the renminbi is set to become the new reserve currency.

An article that Daniel Collins wrote: 
Rising Chinese Redback Could Overtake Debased Greenback <a href="
http://www.financialsense.com/contributors/dan-collins/2011/07/22/rising-chinese-redback-could-overtake-debased-greenback" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.financialsense.com/contributors/dan-collins/2011/07/22/rising-chinese-redback-could-overtake-debased-greenback</a>

 It is my opinion that in this time it is virtually essential 
 to seek information from a variety of sources, to listen to a
 spectrum of voices in order to better  understand the "big 
 picture." A reliance solely upon mainstream corporate media 
 for news and info is a prescription for ignorance. I try to
 share information that counters the monotone of mainstream
 corporate media. 

 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
 information. Do not assume my support for or endorsement 
 of the contents.

 Think for yourself! To paraphrase the late William Cooper: 
 Read everything, listen to everything, but believe nothing 
 until you've researched it yourself.
